descriptions.description: Paper Ui : A calm and complete theme inspired from a whatsapp wallpaper is a dual mode theme with less memory consumption and many ui changes which will give you a better experience during reading. Suggestion : Turn on reading mode for better experience. . Features --> Dark and light wallpapers are added on homescreen; you can switch them according to the mode (dark/light) you use in your phone. --> Lockscreen wallpaper can be changed by changing homescreen wallpaper --> Alarm background added. --> Colourful square shaped icons --> Minimalistic and geometric design. --> Square shaped sliders ( on/off toggles ). --> Whatsapp themed.
